nodes.bodyText: I added a FTL template in lib/commons for the LinkableDto since the class is abstract and any properties it defines will be included only in child classes. I made the description of the links property more uniform, with the only dynamic part being the type of resource(task comment, deployment or process instace, which are the child classes).

nodes.bodyText:
@mboskamp I changed the implementation so that it uses allOf. To do this, I added an extra attribute to the dto macro called extends. This way we don't have to mix JSON and FTL syntax in Dto.ftl files.
The "extended" DTO is referenced at the end of the definition so that its properties are last when seen in the Swagger UI.
